#WasteCrime harms our environment, community and economy.
 
We joined forces with partners to form the Joint Unit for Waste Crime, to share intelligence and work in innovative ways to disrupt waste criminals. 
 
Here's what we've achieved after 1 year üëá
https://t.co/sYwoOeE6Xu https://t.co/dKen8cb5Py

urls.title: Successful first year for waste crime taskforce despite pandemic
urls.description: The Joint Unit for Waste Crime celebrates its first anniversary of cracking down on criminals and gangs who commit serious and organised waste crime.

@Stewflish @EnvAgency Do make sure it's securely fixed, as I've known of some cases of tanks floating away. Do talk to your oil provider

@DobbyWoods @DobbyWoods Hi Dobby, the team have responded back to me to say we don't own the eel pass so don't have the authority to undertake repairs. This would be the Environment Agency. Hope that helps.

The @EnvAgencyYNE have alerted me to the precautionary measures they've taken are taking to protect York from snow melts and rainfall, as the ground is quite saturated. We are not expecting flooding, but please be careful by the river - it is very cold and fast flowing
